Detailed Description

The buffer for the current robot pose(ie positon and orientation) and the time at which it occured. The pose and corresponding times are put into seprate ques, the ques are filled by the odomCallback()/thread in realtime. The data is aquired form robot sensors. The mutex locks are reqired to access the ques as they are shared by a number of theads. This thread is spawned by the ROS main thread. The sepreateThread() thread is used to process this data.
